title: In the Zone
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton talk about airlines that have too much fun on early flights, mandatory fun, targeted ads and more!

Have something interesting you want to share? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com, or leave a voice message at speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.
